original_text:
**INSTITUTION
Transfer Summary
Name :
**NAME[AAA , BBB]
Acct # :
**ID-NUM
MRN :
**ID-NUM
Admitted :
**DATE[Sep 10 2007]
Discharged :
**DATE[Sep 17 2007]
Dict :
**NAME[XXX , WWW]
Attend :
**NAME[ZZZ , YYY]
TRANSFER DIAGNOSIS :
Status post right total knee arthroplasty .
ATTENDING PHYSICIAN :
Dr. **NAME[ZZZ] .
HOSPITAL COURSE :
The patient is a **AGE[in 50s]- year-old patient of Dr. **NAME[ZZZ] with right knee DJD .
She was brought into the day of admission surgery unit at **INSTITUTION for elective total knee arthroplasty on the right on **DATE[Sep 10 2007] .
The patient tolerated this procedure well and was transferred to the regular nursing floor postoperatively .
For detail description of this procedure please see the operative note dated **DATE[Sep 10 2007] .
The patient tolerated the procedure well and her pain managed by the postoperative pain service using nerve block catheters , IV , and oral pain medications .
The patient did well postoperatively , however , she did have a small amount of drainage from her incision site which was serous in nature .
This slowed and eventually stopped by postoperative day 7 .
The patient was ambulatory by postoperative day 5 with physical therapy .
She did report having some pain and was reluctant to participate fully with physical therapy until postoperative day 5 .
The patient was anticoagulated with Coumadin for DVT prophylaxis postoperatively .
Her INR was therapeutic at the time of her discharge .
At the time of her discharge , she is afebrile , vital signs are stable , H and H are within normal limits , and her INR is therapeutic .
FOLLOWUP INSTRUCTIONS :
The patient is to follow up with Dr. **NAME[ZZZ] in 2 to 3 weeks .
She should continue physical therapy while at rehabilitation , be weightbearing as tolerated on her right lower extremity .
She is to continue taking her Coumadin as prescribed .
She should have q. Monday and Thursday blood draws for PT and INR .
These results should be called at **ID-NUM by 2 p.m. on the day of draw .
**NAME[VVV UUU] will call with any adjustments to Coumadin dosing as needed .
If the patient develops and additional problems with her right lower extremity such as increased erythema , pain , numbness , or tingling or other problems , she should contact Dr. **NAME[ZZZ] 's office immediately .
______________________________
**NAME[WWW XXX , CCC]
HS Job # 788312 / 38142 /
SHY # **ID-NUM
D :
**DATE[Sep 17 2007] 19:30
T :
**DATE[Sep 17 2007] 19:42
**CARBON-COPY
